World.Name: David
World.Entry:
December, 1050: David understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals January, 1051: David can track the animals in the area February, 1051: David is in Animal Empathy Training and practicing existing skills March, 1051: David: Hi Layla Layla: Hi David! Mum sent me to tell you to do some chores around the farm instead of just relaxing all the time. If you want though, we could sneak off and go play instead! David: I'll think on it - you always were a bad influence on me Layla: Hey - that's what sisters are for!
March, 1051: David does nothing all month
